data.message: Diaspora investment platform UI patterns: 1) Portfolio cards must show region tags (Nigeria-Tech, South America-Infrastructure), impact markers (Emerging, Africa, High Impact), verification badges ("Diaspora Verified"). 2) Include "How dealflow works" section: Network → Vet → Invest with descriptions. 3) Deal cards need: country flag, sector, rating score (e.g., "Rating: 86"), funding amounts, tags. 4) World map with active deal markers adds credibility. 5) Testimonials must be specific: "found 3 vetted companies in Nigeria within 2 weeks" not generic praise.
